name: DomoticzBridge
0:
”Alexa, turn on living room light.”
”Alexa, set thermostat to 21 degrees.”
”Alexa, what is the temperature in the living room?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Domoticz Bridge lets Alexa control your Domoticz devices.
After enabling the skill, go to https://da-bridge.tarthorst.net/ to enter your Domoticz credentials.
